alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON... SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN AND NORTHWESTERN ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pine Forest, or near Vidor, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Vidor, Rose City, Pine Forest, Lakeview, and Weiss Bluff. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 863 and 848. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson
